plot: Portrait of a flower child of the 60's who has recreated the spirit of that era in a farm somewhere in Crete, Greece. His views on the modern way of life and recollections from a glorious and free spirited past.
title: To kentro tou sympantos
plot_es: Portrait of a flower child of the 60's who has recreated the spirit of that era in a farm somewhere in Crete, Greece. His views on the modern way of life and recollections from a glorious and free spirited past.
